abstract: Brooklyn Winery in Williamsburg and Red Hook Winery in Red Hook are among eight official wine producers within five boroughs that are contributing to urban winemaking movement.
lead_paragraph: An urban winemaking movement is growing in New York City. Today, there are eight official wine producers in the city, though most make their wine in facilities upstate.
snippet: An urban winemaking movement is growing in New York City. Today, there are eight official wine producers in the city, though most make their wine in facilities upstate.
